languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс усмехается, словно пытается спрятаться за ухмылкой.{/n} "Самая безопасная из всех тайн, которыми я владею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс усмехается, словно пытается спрятать за ухмылкой истинные эмоции.{/n} "Самая безопасная из всех тайн, которыми я владею".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс усмехается, словно пытается спрятаться за ухмылкой.{/n} "Самая безопасная из всех тайн, которыми я владею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."
{n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."
{n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."
{n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

languages.text: {n}海因里希笑了一下，似乎打算靠幽默来掩饰过去。{/n}“在我所有的秘密之中，这个秘密是最不危险的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希笑了一下，似乎打算靠幽默来掩饰过去。{/n}“在我所有的秘密之中，这个秘密是最不危险的。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se ríe un poco, como si intentara escudarse con el humor.{/n} «De todos los secretos que guardo, este es el menos peligroso».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se ríe un poco, como si intentara escudarse con el humor.{/n} «De todos los secretos que guardo, este es el menos peligroso».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、冗談めかすようにして少し笑った。{/n}「俺が持っている秘密の中で、それが一番危険じゃないものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、冗談めかすようにして少し笑った。{/n}「俺が持っている秘密の中で、それが一番危険じゃないものだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un petit rire, comme pour masquer sa gêne derrière une pointe d'humour.{/n} « De tous les secrets que je garde, c'est de loin le moins dangereux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un petit rire, comme pour masquer sa gêne derrière une pointe d'humour.{/n} « De tous les secrets que je garde, c'est de loin le moins dangereux. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht kurz, als wolle er sich hinter Humor verstecken.{/n} "Von allen meinen Geheimnissen ist dieses wohl am wenigsten gefährlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lacht kurz, als wolle er sich hinter Humor verstecken.{/n} "Von allen meinen Geheimnissen ist dieses wohl am wenigsten gefährlich."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, neşenin ardına saklanmaya çalışıyormuş gibi hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Sakladığım tüm sırlar arasında en az tehlikeli olan bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs a little, as though trying to hide behind humour.{/n} "Of all the secrets in my keeping, that is the least dangerous."
